content: I'd like to try out the lemon poppy seed muffin recipe, but I was wondering if I could substitute the almond flour with coconut flour only? I've been experimenting with coconut flour in my sugar-free baking and I think it would work well in this recipe. Also, do you think I could reduce the amount of stevia powder to 1/8 teaspoon since I'm not a big fan of overly sweet muffins?
